text.title: 2000-2015 HPCA/ISCA/MICRO Co-author Graph
text.more:
Data and Visualization

Data was collected from DBLP dataset and laid out with Gephi. The interactive display is created with the Sigma.js library, JavaScipt, and CSS based on an earlier interface by Greenpeace. Please note that this is an experimental visualization that may not work on all browsers. It has been tested to work on Firefox 12, Chrome 18, Android Ice Cream Sandwich and Jelly Bean, and iPad 2. The data was parsed by Diyu Zhou and the visualization produced by Yuchen Hao.
